Vanderhoof is found near the geographical centre in the Interior Plateau region. The population of Vanderhoof was 4,346 in 2021. The mayor of Vanderhoof is Kevin Moutray. Vanderhoof is known for their bird sanctuary which is found along the Nechako River. During their yearly migration, the river is passed through by Canada geese, swan, as well as other birds. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Settlements in British Columbia
